lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But the senior officials, asking not to be indentified, said that despite intense pressure from the Reagan Administration, Ottawa was not considering any kind of formal limits on Canadian shipments to the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The officials, asking not to be identified, said the government will investigate an industry contention that steel imported from countries such as South Korea and Taiwan is being diverted to the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Canada exported two billion Canadian dlrs worth of steel in 1986, while importing 944-mln dlrs worth of the product in the same year.
